date.description: The publication date of a document, eg "2018-01-01" (note: dates can sometimes be incomplete and include only the month or the year).

research_org_cities.description: City of the GRID organisations authors are affiliated to, expressed as GeoNames ID and name.

times_cited.description: Number of citations (note: does not support emptiness filters).

field_citation_ratio.description: Relative citation performance of article when compared to similarly aged articles in its area of research (note: does not support emptiness filters).

research_orgs.description: GRID organisations associated to a publication. Identifiers are automatically extracted from author affiliations text, so they can be missing in some cases (note: this field supports :ref:`filter-functions`: ``count``).

linkout.description: Original URL for a publication full text.

publisher.description: Name of the publisher as a string.

funder_countries.description: The country of the GRID organisation funding this publication.

research_org_countries.description: Country of the GRID organisations authors are affiliated to, identified using GeoNames codes (note: this field supports :ref:`filter-functions`: ``count``).

mesh_terms.description: Medical Subject Heading terms as used in PubMed.

issue.description: The issue number of a publication.

open_access_categories.description: Open Access categories for publications. See below for more examples.
open_access_categories.long_description:
Open Access category data for publications values:

        * `oa_all`: Article is freely available
        * `gold_pure`: Version Of Record (VOR) is free under an open licence from a full OA journal
        * `gold_hybrid`: Version Of Record (VOR) is free under an open licence in a paid-access journal
        * `gold_bronze`: Freely available on publisher page, but without an open licence
        * `green_pub`: Free copy of published version in an OA repository
        * `green_acc`: Free copy of accepted version in an OA repository
        * `green_sub`: Free copy of submitted version, or where version is unknown, in an OA repository
        * `closed`: No freely available copy has been identified

recent_citations.description: Number of citations received in the last two years. Does not support emptiness filters

book_title.description: The title of the book a chapter belongs to (note: this field is available only for chapters).

pages.description: The pages of the publication, as they would appear in a citation record.

reference_ids.description: Dimensions publication ID for publications in the references list, i.e. outgoing citations (see also: :ref:`data-model` section).

funders.description: The GRID organisation funding this publication.

research_org_country_names.description: Country name of the GRID organisations authors are affiliated to, as a string.

proceedings_title.description: Title of the conference proceedings volume associated to a publication.

relative_citation_ratio.description: Relative citation performance of an article when compared to others in its area of research (note: does not support emptiness filters).

concepts.description: Concepts describing the main topics of a publication (note: automatically derived from the publication text using machine learning).

book_doi.description: The DOI of the book a chapter belongs to (note: this field is available only for chapters).

book_series_title.description: The title of the book series book, belong to.

researchers.description: Researcher IDs matched to the publication's authors list. (note: this returns only the disambiguated authors of a publication; in order to get the full authors list, the field `author_affiliations` should be used). This field supports :ref:`filter-functions`: ``count``.

journal_lists.description: Independent grouping of journals outside of Dimensions, e.g. 'ERA 2015' or 'Norwegian register level 1'.

supporting_grant_ids.description: Grants supporting a publication, returned as a list of dimensions grants IDs  (see also: :ref:`data-model` section).

research_org_state_names.description: State name of the GRID organisations authors are affiliated to, as a string.

authors.description: Ordered list of authors names and their affiliations, as they appear in the original publication. The list can include researcher and organization identifiers, when available (note: in order to search for disambiguated authors, use the `in researchers` syntax).

journal.description: The journal a publication belongs to.

research_org_state_codes.description: State of the GRID organisations authors are affiliated to, expressed as GeoNames codes (ISO‌-3166-2).

year.description: The year of publication (note: when the `date` field is available, this is equal to the year part of the full date).

type.description: Publication type (one of: article, chapter, proceeding, monograph, preprint or book).

date_inserted.description: Date when the record was inserted into Dimensions (note: this field does not support exact match on the data, only range filters e.g. `<=` or `>=').

recent_citations_total.name: recent_citations_total
recent_citations_total.description: For a given article, in a given year, the number of citations accrued in the last two year period. Single value stored per document, year window rolls over in July.

fcr_gavg.name: fcr_gavg
fcr_gavg.description: Geometric mean of `field_citation_ratio` field (note: This field cannot be used for sorting results).
